abilities.description: The user creates a massive wall of fire to block incoming attacks. Ace used this to counter Aokiji's Ice Block: Pheasant Beak.
The user creates small fire projectiles that can be detonated on contact with targets.
The user turns their fist into flames and launches a devastating fire punch.

keyMoments.description: Ace uses Kyokaen for the first time to counter Admiral Aokiji's ice attack, demonstrating fire's advantage over ice.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the tactical application of the Mera Mera no Mi in high-level combat and its type advantage against ice-based abilities.

reveals.information: Kyokaen (Mirror Fire Flame) can create defensive fire walls capable of countering Admiral-level ice attacks
The Mera Mera no Mi's fire has a natural advantage over the Hie Hie no Mi's ice

abilities.description: The user releases a massive wave of ice in the shape of a pheasant. Can freeze large areas and multiple targets instantly.

keyMoments.description: Aokiji uses Ice Block: Pheasant Beak against Ace, but it is countered by Ace's Kyokaen due to fire's advantage over ice.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a limitation of the Hie Hie no Mi when facing fire-based Devil Fruits, even when wielded by an Admiral.

reveals.information: Ice Block: Pheasant Beak creates a massive pheasant-shaped ice wave attack
The Hie Hie no Mi's ice is vulnerable to fire-based Devil Fruit abilities
